result.adr_address: 9 City Garden Rd, North Point, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 9 City Garden Rd, North Point, Hong Kong
result.name: Garden Cafe

reviews.text:
🍴. 🍽.   🥖. 🍗. 🍔. 🥩 🍗 🍱 🍡🍢🍱. 🥗🥚. 🌭  🍔   🍤. 🍐. 🍎. 🍌  🍓  🍜. 🍱 . 🍶 🥤 🍵  🍰🍧 🍡. ☕️  🥢

Happy Summer 19.

Garden Cafe is located in City Garden Hotel in North Point, Hong Kong. 

The Garden Cafe is the official restaurant for the City Garden Hotel, because the buffet breakfast,  the buffet lunch and the buffet dinner is all here.

I've only had the pleasure of having the buffet lunch here.  The buffet lunch is worth the money even though it has double in price from March 2018 when I was here.

The last time I came to lunch, the price has gone up to HK $350.00, and that is aoittle steep.

Was here for breakfast. Standard hotel buffet with continental and dim sum spread. With many kinds of spread to choose from, for your waffle :) had added the breakfast option for this day, on the last day of the trip, so even this standard buffet felt extra special, haha. Updated the star rating to five-stars. Can't recall anything bad to mark down the rating.
I took the buffet and it was good. It was not busy. Buffet comes with drinks. Good variety of food. Nice desserts also. Atmosphere is not so great but one has tables with a great view.

Really disappointing when I visited with my daughter for afternoon tea. The service was poor and there were issues with the food quality. Wrong coffee was served, service was slow and at times non-existent. We were served hard/stale scones. These were sent back only to be replaced with a another hard, stale scone. On the third attempt, we were served a slightly softer, although still not tasty scone!!!!
Open sandwich bread was also hard and stale. Definitely a quality control issue here, which is disappointing for a 4* hotel, that charges 4/5* prices!!!

The Garden Cafe locates on the 1st Floor of the City Garden Hotel is 1 of my favorite places to have a nice long leisure.  

The Garden Cafe have  a buffet lunch that is open from 12 noon to 2:30 pm.  

The food is fresh and plenty of variety, they even have 2 type of soups everyday. They have a traditional Chinese soup, and they have a Western style cream soup.

There is plenty of shush to choose from, the smoke Salmon is quite nice and the fresh shrimp cocktail is my favorite.  All the
Seafood is fresh.  

Then 1 can opt for the hot grill delights that is prepared in their open kitchen.  Or opt for the steam delights.    Then there is the fried items that must be fried.

The salad bar is fresh and plentiful.  

They have 2 different types of traditional Chinese deserts that is a must have for some Chinese folks.

The Ice Cream Station have something for everyone.  They have plenty of toppings for the ice cream fan, chocolate sprinkles, gummy baers, M & M and other goodies that i do not even know.

Don't forget the different kind of Italian and French pastries.

The staff is always very nice and pleasant.  They cater to the customer's needs, and they always have their happy faces on.

The Garden Cafe is also open for a beeakfast and dinner buffet.

result.adr_address: 9 City Garden Rd, North Point, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 9 City Garden Rd, North Point, Hong Kong
result.name: City Garden Hotel Hong Kong

reviews.text:
For 5 years of my trips to this hotel, this trip is the worst.
When booking hotel, did not warn about the repair from 10 am to 18 pm.  4 rooms were booked and with the two young children the constant sound of the renovation works was very disturbing.  Rooms were no refund when canceling the reservation.  The situation is more than not pleasant.
Cleaning the rooms also became much worse.  for three days I never put soap on my bathroom floor in the corners and so on. Breakfast was worse. Despite the service fee of 10%, always left a tip.  always recommended this hotel to friends and wrote good reviews on booking sites.  but despite the fact that there is a map of the Amber level of this hotel, it is probably time to look for another hotel for the next holiday.

Awesome hotel experience with great and clean rooms. Room service is generally accommodating for your schedule as long as it is within business standards. There is a gym and a pool on the second floor that is available for use.

🛏 🛋 🛁 🛋  🛁   💻  🚽 ☕️  🍽 🥄  🥣 🍌 🍓🍴🥚  🥓  🥯  🍊 🍌 🍎  

City Garden Hotel is my favorite hotel in Hong Kong now, and it was 1 of my favorite hotel in Hong Kong for almost 25 years.
I stayed here 1st way back in 1995 with my father, then I also stayed here with my uncle and aunt also.

The rooms are quite spacious and large compare to other hotels in Hong Kong.   I have had the privilege of staying at 3 other hotels in Hong Kong whose rooms was equal in size.   I'll save the details for another review. 

City Garden Hotel is in the process of renovating the interior of the hotel, including most or all of the rooms.

I can't wait for them to finish the renovations.

 Happy Summer 19.

This hotel is smoke-free hotel but smells a lot . so you need to stand the smell of smoke, specially in the restroom in the room.  The buffet was great...   I paid aroud $290 for two child breakfast.  담배냄새 엄청 심합니다. 그래도 음식은 맛있음
Nice stay. Decent enough location. Helpful staff.

result.adr_address: 香港北角城市花園道9號
result.formatted_address: 香港北角城市花園道9號
result.name: 城市花園酒店

reviews.text: 建物は古めです、朝食も特に良くありませんが、滞在中利用可能なスマホが部屋にあります。国際電話も無料でかけられ、テザリングもできるのでとても便利！　海外シム買わずに来たら正解でした。マリオットくらいでしか知らなかったサービスなので、とても満足です。ミネラルウォーターは廊下のサーバーから適宜補充できるため、暑い香港でもこれまた便利。空港との間のシャトルバスも一時間に一本150香港ドルで、電車使うのとそう変わらず便利。隣にセブンイレブンや飲食店もあり、滞在中に不便なく過ごせます。地味にオススメです。

For 5 years of my trips to this hotel, this trip is the worst.
When booking hotel, did not warn about the repair from 10 am to 18 pm.  4 rooms were booked and with the two young children the constant sound of the renovation works was very disturbing.  Rooms were no refund when canceling the reservation.  The situation is more than not pleasant.
Cleaning the rooms also became much worse.  for three days I never put soap on my bathroom floor in the corners and so on. Breakfast was worse. Despite the service fee of 10%, always left a tip.  always recommended this hotel to friends and wrote good reviews on booking sites.  but despite the fact that there is a map of the Amber level of this hotel, it is probably time to look for another hotel for the next holiday.

Awesome hotel experience with great and clean rooms. Room service is generally accommodating for your schedule as long as it is within business standards. There is a gym and a pool on the second floor that is available for use.

🛏 🛋 🛁 🛋  🛁   💻  🚽 ☕️  🍽 🥄  🥣 🍌 🍓🍴🥚  🥓  🥯  🍊 🍌 🍎  

City Garden Hotel is my favorite hotel in Hong Kong now, and it was 1 of my favorite hotel in Hong Kong for almost 25 years.
I stayed here 1st way back in 1995 with my father, then I also stayed here with my uncle and aunt also.

The rooms are quite spacious and large compare to other hotels in Hong Kong.   I have had the privilege of staying at 3 other hotels in Hong Kong whose rooms was equal in size.   I'll save the details for another review. 

City Garden Hotel is in the process of renovating the interior of the hotel, including most or all of the rooms.

I can't wait for them to finish the renovations.

 Happy Summer 19.
中上價錢，地點好，合理回報。

result.adr_address: 香港北角城市花園道9號
result.formatted_address: 香港北角城市花園道9號
result.name: 綠茵閣餐廳

reviews.text: Кафе при отеле с каждым последующим посещением, на мой взгляд все хуже. Меню делается менее разнообразным, качество еды падает. Персонал достаточно внимательный.
冇乜嘢食，搵唔到貴價食品。😪😪
好食。低食，價錢不貴。值得推薦。

🍴. 🍽.   🥖. 🍗. 🍔. 🥩 🍗 🍱 🍡🍢🍱. 🥗🥚. 🌭  🍔   🍤. 🍐. 🍎. 🍌  🍓  🍜. 🍱 . 🍶 🥤 🍵  🍰🍧 🍡. ☕️  🥢

食物還可以，是比較便宜的酒店自助餐。
